ROPs: 192
Memory Size: 48 GB
Memory Type: GDDR6

GPU Variant: AD102-895-A1
Architecture: Ada Lovelace
Foundry: TSMC
Process Size: 5 nm
Transistors: 76,300 million
Density: 125.3M / mm²
